listing.title: LOCAL NEWS
listing.description:
16 YEAR OLD GIRL ALLEGEDLY RAPED

A 16 year old girl was allegedly raped by a person she met while waiting at a bus stop near Charminar on Monday.

The issue came to the light after June. Minor girl complained of stomach pain on Sunday afternoon and open up about the incident to her mother.

According to a release by police, a girl used to work at a cloth store near Charminar. After work on Monday, she was at bus stop waiting to get home. Around the same time, young man approached her and struck up a conversation. And as it got lets about 11:30 PM. Then the man convinced her and took her to his house at Langar house and raped her.

Afraid of being scolded for getting late, the girl even lied to her parents that she would sleep at her friends house. The next day. On May 31st, the man dropped her off at the store during the opening hours. Give his phone number and left.

The police traced the accused mogul, Nagar Ring Rd, at longer house and identify him as Muhammed Sofiyan, 21, and event worker. He was booked for kidnapping, rape and related provision under protection of children from sexual offense acts.

listing.title: LOCAL NEWS
listing.description:
NEWLYWED SOFTWARE ENGINEER FOUND DEAD IN BENGALURU


A 25 year old newly married software engineer was found dead at her house in Subramanium on Saturday.

The deceased was identified as Anju,a native of Chikkamagaluru. She married to Anju four months ago.

Her family alleged that Ms Anju Complain to them about harassment from her in laws a fortnight ago.

The family has alleged that she has been tortured by her in-laws which led her to take the extreme step. The police have registered a case of unnatural death and are awaiting the post mortem report to ascertain the cause of death to take further action.

listing.title: LOCAL NEWS
listing.description:
SCHOOL TO OBSERVE ENVIRONMENTAL DAY TODAY

World environmental day will be observed in school in the states on Monday.

The General Education Department has directed that the observance be held on Monday since the day fell on Sunday.

Minister for General Education V-sivakuty directs that the activity to take the word environmental day message of only one earth , as should be in conducted in school. An environmental pledge could also be taken. The planting of saplings could also be taken up.

The minister will take part in World Environmental Day observance, as Government high school. Kadiry Noman here on Monday.

listing.title: GLOBAL NEWS
listing.description:
RUSSIA SEEMS SUCCESS IN UKRAINE AFTER MONTHS OF FAILURE

It is a reversal from the early invasion, where Russia was humiliatingly pushed back. The analyst both said Russia is putting hard now but will likely lose momentum soon.

Russia is finding success in its invasion of Ukraine after wrapping up its original plan to focus on a far, narrow area analyst told Insider.

Two experts pointed to the recent gain in the Dobens region. Which align with Bleaker assessments from Ukrainian official who are urgently seeking Western aid to rebalance the odd.

It is a stark reversal from the early week of the war, when Russia appeared to expect Ukraine to fall within weeks. It’s troops tried to seize Kyiv while also attacking on several other fronts, but were humiliatingly pushed back.

On March 25th. Russia redefine its main goal Saying it is wanted to take the eastern Doben region with which had been partly healed by pro Russian separatists since 2014.

Since the Russians artillery have pummeled the region and Russia began to achieve its narrow aims abate while taking heavy losses.

listing.title: INTERNATIONAL NEWS
listing.description:
CHINESE PLANE CRASH THAT KILLED 132 CAUSED BY THE INTERNATIONAL ACT COLUMN U.S. OFFICIALS

The Chinese Eastern airlines plane crash that killed 132 people is believed to have been caused by an intentional act.

The Boeing 737-800 passengers jets were flying from Kunming to Guangzhou on March 21st. When it was plugged into a mountain area in Guangxi China. Old 123 passengers and nine crew members were killed.

The officials who spoke to ABC News point to the plant’s flaps not being engaged on landing gear not put down. The near vertical descent of the plane, they believe, would have required intentional force.

The plane slammed into the ground with such force that it created a 66 foot deep hole and a ground, according to the Chinese officials.

Investigators also looked into one of the pilot’s personal life and background and believe he may have been struggling through certain issues right before the crash.

The U.S. International Transportation Safety Board, said all information on the investigation will come from there. Counterparts in the Civil Aviation Administration of China, But regulators and Boeing have not flagged any mechanical issues. Sources said Chinese investigators also haven’t flagged any mechanical issues.
listing.address: Workers search through debris at the China flight crash site in tengxian County in southern China region, March 24, 2019

listing.title: INTERNATIONAL NEWS
listing.description:
FIRST CASE OF COVID-19 CONFIRMED IN NIGERIA

The Federal Ministry of Health has confirmed a coronavirus disease, COVID-19 cases in Lagos State, Nigeria.

The case, which was confirmed on the 27th of February 2022, is the first case to be reported in Nigeria since the outbreak in China in January 2022.

The case is an Italian citizens who worked in Nigeria and returned from Milan, Italy to Lagos, Nigeria on the 25th of February 2022. He was confirmed by the virology Laboratory of Lagos University Teaching Hospital, parts of the laboratory network of Nigeria Center for Disease Control. The Patient is clinically stable, with no serious symptoms, and is being managed at the infectious disease hospital in Yaba, Lagos.

The Government of Nigeria, through the Federal Ministry of Health, has been strengthening measures to ensure that the outbreak in Nigeria is controlled and contained quickly. The multi sectoral coronavirus preparedness group, led to the Nigerian Center of Disease Control (NCDC) has immediately activated its national Agency Operations Center and will work closely with local state health authorities to respond to the case and implement from control measures.

I wish to assure all Nigerians that we have been beefing up our preparedness capabilities since the first confirmation of cases in China, and we will ensure all the resources made available by the government to respond to this case.

All Nigerians should take care of their health and maintain hand respiratory hygiene to protect themselves and others, including their own family Following the precautious below.

1. Regularly and thoroughly, wash your hands with soap and water and use alcohol based hand sanitizer.

2. Maintain at least 1.5 meters distance between yourself and anyone who is coughing and sneezing.

3. A person with persistent cough or sneezing should stay home or keep a social distance.

4. Make sure you and the people around you follow respiratory hygiene.

5. Stay home if you feel unwell with symptoms like fever, cough difficulties in breathing

6. Stay informed on the latest developments about COVID-19 through official channel on TV and radio, including Lagos State Ministry of Health and NCDC. Federal Ministry of Health.
